results.title: Plasma neurofilament light chain protein as a predictor of days in delirium and deep sedation, mortality and length of stay in critically ill patients
results.text_hl: MoDUS was a randomised placebo-controlled @<m>DISEASE_Delirium</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003693 @@@delirium@@@ trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ done in an UK adult general ICU.

results.title: Statin and Its Association With Delirium in the Medical ICU.
results.text_hl: When considering types of statins used, this reduction was significant in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ using @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. Randomized trials of various statin types in hospitalized @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ prone to @<m>DISEASE_Delirium</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003693 @@@delirium@@@ should validate their use in protection from @<m>DISEASE_Delirium</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003693 @@@delirium@@@.

citations.NLM: Mather JF, Corradi JP, Waszynski C, Noyes A, Duan Y, Grady J, Dicks R. Statin and Its Association With Delirium in the Medical ICU. Crit Care Med. 2017 Sep;45(9):1515-1522. PMID: 28622167

results.title: Simvastatin for the prevention and treatment of delirium in critically ill, mechanically ventilated patients (MoDUS): a cost-effectiveness analysis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ for the prevention and treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Delirium</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003693 @@@delirium@@@ in critically ill, mechanically ventilated @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (MoDUS): a cost-effectiveness analysis.

results.title: Evaluation of early administration of simvastatin in the prevention and treatment of delirium in critically ill patients undergoing mechanical ventilation (MoDUS): a randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Neuroinflammatory_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D000090862 @@@Neuroinflammation@@@ might be an important mechanism in the pathogenesis of @<m>DISEASE_Delirium</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003693 @@@delirium@@@, and since @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ has anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ properties it might reduce @<m>DISEASE_Delirium</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003693 @@@delirium@@@.

citations.NLM: Page VJ, Casarin A, Ely EW, Zhao XB, McDowell C, Murphy L, McAuley DF. results.title: Evaluating early administration of the hydroxymethylglutaryl-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin in the prevention and treatment of delirium in critically ill ventilated patients (MoDUS trial): study protocol for a randomized controlled trial
results.text_hl: This trial will test the efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on reducing @<m>DISEASE_Delirium</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003693 @@@delirium@@@ in the @DISEASE_Critical_Illness @DISEASE_MESH:D016638 @@@critically ill@@@.

results.title: The Role of Perioperative Statin Use in the Prevention of Delirium After Total Knee Replacement Under Spinal Anesthesia.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Continuous perioperative statin use may be associated with a significantly lower risk of @<m>DISEASE_Delirium</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003693 @@@delirium@@@ after TKA under spinal anesthesia; @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was the most effective statin for @DISEASE_Emergence_Delirium @DISEASE_MESH:D000071257 @@@POD@@@ prevention.

citations.NLM: Oh TK, Park HY, Shin HJ, Jeon YT, Do SH, Hwang JW. The Role of Perioperative Statin Use in the Prevention of Delirium After Total Knee Replacement Under Spinal Anesthesia. J Arthroplasty. 2018 Dec;33(12):3666-3671.e1. PMID: 30236494
